laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormal elevation of liver enzyme levels.
Suspicion of metastatic disease, three visible tumors.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After resuming chemotherapy with imatinib mesylate, subsequent CT scan showed slight improvement in liver metastases.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated a decrease in previous metastases and no new lesions.
Demonstrated new metastases to the liver.
Demonstrated new metastases to the liver.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 1-month follow-up, no new tumors and the identified ones were reduced in size.
